mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEPARTMENT_HISTORY (DEPT_HIST_ID , EMP_ID , DEPT_STRT_DT , DEPT_END_DT , CN_NOTE , DEL_YN , PAST_DEPT_ID) VALUES ('DEPT_HT_'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '_' || LPAD(SEQ_DEPT_HT_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{empId} , #{hireDt} , SYSDATE , #{departmentHistoryVO.cnNote} , 'N' , #{deptId})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(D.DEPT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DEPT_END_DT FROM (SELECT DEPT_END_DT FROM DEPARTMENT_HISTORY WHERE EMP_ID = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY DEPT_HIST_ID DESC ) D WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DH.DEPT_HIST_ID , DH.EMP_ID , TO_CHAR(DH.DEPT_STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DEPT_STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(DH.DEPT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DEPT_END_DT , DH.CN_NOTE , DH.PAST_DEPT_ID , D.DEPT_NAME FROM DEPARTMENT_HISTORY DH INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPT_ID = DH.PAST_DEPT_ID WHERE DH.EMP_ID = #{_parameter} AND DH.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY DEPT_STRT_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOB_HISTORY (JOB_HIST_ID , EMP_ID , JOB_STRT_DT , JOB_END_DT , CN_NOTE , DEL_YN , PAST_JOB_ID) VALUES ('JOB_HT_' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '_' || LPAD(SEQ_JOB_HT_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) , #{empId} , #{hireDt} , SYSDATE , #{jobHistoryVO.cnNote} , 'N' , #{jobId})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(JH.JOB_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') JOB_END_DT FROM (SELECT JOB_END_DT FROM JOB_HISTORY WHERE EMP_ID = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY JOB_HIST_ID DESC ) JH WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT JH.JOB_HIST_ID , JH.EMP_ID , JH.PAST_JOB_ID , TO_CHAR(JH.JOB_STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') JOB_STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(JH.JOB_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') JOB_END_DT , JH.CN_NOTE FROM JOB_HISTORY JH INNER JOIN JOB J ON J.JOB_ID = JH.PAST_JOB_ID WHERE JH.EMP_ID = #{_parameter} AND JH.DEL_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY JOB_STRT_DT DESC
mapper.insert: SELECT PSTN_ID , EMP_ID , PSTN_STRT_DT , PSTN_END_DT , CN_NOTE , DEL_YN , PAST_PSTN_ID VALUES ('PSTN_HT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '_' || LPAD(SEQ_PSTN_HT_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) , #{empId} , #{hireDt} , SYSDATE , #{PositionHistoryVO.cnNote} , 'N' , #{pstnId})
mapper.select: SELECT PH.PSTN_ID , PH.EMP_ID , PH.PAST_PSTN_ID , TO_CHAR(PH.PSTN_STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PSTN_STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(PH.PSTN_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PSTN_END_DT , PH.CN_NOTE , C.CMCD_NAME , PC.CMCD_NAME FROM POSITION_HISTORY PH INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON C.CMCD_ID = PH.PSTN_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE PC ON PC.CMCD_ID = PH.PAST_PSTN_ID WHERE PH.EMP_ID = #{_parameter} AND PH.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PSTN_STRT_DT DESC
SELECT TO_CHAR(PH.PSTN_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PSTN_END_DT FROM (SELECT PSTN_END_DT FROM POSITION_HISTORY WHERE EMP_ID = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PSTN_HIST_ID DESC ) PH WHERE ROWNUM = 1
